description: TS Foxxy has been getting some frightening phone calls. The caller is getting more and more aggressive trying to get Foxxy to talk about what kind of porno she likes to watch. When the calls turn into threats, Foxxy calls her beloved Angel Allwood over to keep her company. Angel shows up right away. Fear makes women horny and it takes no time for these ladies to channel their fear into fucking.
title: Scream!!!! with Orgasms.
